thread.title: Moto G5 Plus will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting March 15th
thread.title_full: Moto G5 Plus will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting March 15th

title: Moto G5 Plus will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting March 15th
text:
Moto G5 Plus will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting March 15th Moto G5 Plus will be available exclusively on Flipkart starting March 15th By March 8, 2017 “The Moto G5 Plus sports an all-metal body, a fingerprint sensor and a 5.2-inch display” 
Lenovo introduced the latest Moto G series smartphones, the Moto G5 and Moto G5 Plus , at its pre-MWC event on February 26th. Soon after the unveiling, the brand revealed that it will be launching the Moto G5 Plus in India on March 15th. Now, Flipkart has announced that it will be exclusively selling the phone in the country from March 15th. . @Moto_IND A big warm welcome to #MotoG5PlusonFlipkart ! The most awaited G is all set to be available exclusively on Flipkart on the 15th. pic.twitter.com/T4abYoD7Oq — Flipkart (@Flipkart) March 7, 2017 
Neither Lenovo nor Flipkart have revealed if the Moto G5 will be landing in India alongside the Moto G5 Plus. However, speculations suggest that the Moto G5 will launch a couple of weeks after the Moto G5 Plus goes on sale. 
To recap, the Moto G5 and G5 Plus ( first impressions ) offer metal unibody designs, fingerprint sensors, water-repellent nano coatings, Android Nougat and fast charging. The Moto G5 is a 5-incher, while the G5 Plus gets a bigger 5.2-inch display. They are expected to be priced below Rs 15,000 mark in the country. Facebook Comments
